tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE text_tag_relations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    text_data_id INT,
    tag_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (text_data_id) REFERENCES text_data_tags(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES tags(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Tagged_Text_Data (
    tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_id INT,
    pos_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (text_id) REFERENCES Text_Data(text_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (pos_id) REFERENCES Part_of_Speech(pos_id)
);
